extracted_news.title: The market capitalization of USDe has surpassed 1 billion US dollars.
extracted_news.body: THE MARKET CAPITALIZATION OF USDE HAS SURPASSED 1 BILLION US DOLLARS.

extracted_news.title: USDE Market Capitalization Exceeds $900 Million
extracted_news.body: The market capitalization of the stablecoin USDE, issued by Ethna Labs, has surpassed $900 million, reaching $902.78 million. USDE is an Ethereum-based stablecoin backed by derivatives, and Ethna allows users to use USD, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral for its creation.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Raises $4M for USDE Treasury, Capitalizes on Ether Futures
extracted_news.body: Ethena Labs, a stablecoin project, has successfully raised $4 million for its USDE treasury. The stablecoin generates yield by shorting Ether futures and capturing funding rates, which have seen a significant increase in the past two weeks.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Integrates USDE with Injective Blockchain
extracted_news.body: USDE developer Ethena Labs announces integration with Injective. According to official sources, on March 6th, Layer 1 blockchain network Injective announced its integration with Ethena, marking Ethena's first integration beyond the wider Ethereum ecosystem. Users of Injective, Cosmos, and the wider IBC ecosystem can easily access USDE. Through this integration, USDE will be available to Injective users starting from Wednesday, March 6th. In addition, USDE holders on Injective will be eligible to participate in the Ethena Shards event starting on Monday, March 11th.

extracted_news.title: USDE Stablecoin Market Cap Surpasses $700 Million
extracted_news.body: The market capitalization of the stablecoin USDE, issued by Ethna Labs, has surpassed $700 million, currently standing at $742 million. USDE is a stablecoin based on Ethereum and is collateralized by derivatives. It achieves price stability through 'delta-neutral' hedging in both centralized and decentralized venues. Ethna allows users to use USD, ETH, or liquidity collateralized tokens as collateral to create USDE.

extracted_news.title: USDE Market Capitalization Exceeds $500 Million
extracted_news.body: Market capitalization of USDE surpasses $500 million. According to BlockBeats news on February 28th, the market capitalization of the stablecoin USDE issued by Ethna Labs has exceeded 500 million US dollars, currently reporting 500.23 million US dollars. USDE is a stablecoin based on Ethereum, collateralized by derivatives, and achieves price stability through "delta-neutral" hedging in centralized and decentralized venues. To create USDE, Ethna allows users to use US dollars, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

extracted_news.title: USDE Market Capitalization Exceeds 400 Million US Dollars
extracted_news.body: The market capitalization of USDE, a stablecoin issued by Ethna Labs, has surpassed 400 million US dollars, now standing at 437.65 million US dollars. USDE is based on Ethereum, collateralized by derivatives, and maintains price stability through 'delta neutral' hedging in both centralized and decentralized venues. Ethna Labs allows the creation of USDE using USD, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

extracted_news.title: USDE Pool on Ethena Reaches Deposit Limit Again, TVL Hits $406 Million
extracted_news.body: The USDE pool on Ethena has once again reached its deposit limit. According to a report by BlockBeats on February 22, Ethena Labs, the developer of USDE, has increased the pool limit of USDE to $100 million. As of now, the deposit limit has been reached again. The current TVL of the USDE pool has reached $406 million.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Increases USDE Pool Limit to $100 Million
extracted_news.body: Ethena Labs, the developer of USDE, has increased the USDE pool limit to 100 million US dollars as of February 22nd. The current Total Value Locked (TVL) of the pool is 66.25 million US dollars. Additionally, the overall TVL of Ethena is reported to be 364 million US dollars, according to the official website.

extracted_news.title: Ethena's $50 Million USDE Deposit Pool Reaches Limit Again; TVL Hits $342 Million
extracted_news.body: Since Ethena announced the opening of a USD stablecoin deposit pool with a limit of $50 million yesterday, it has once again reached the deposit limit. According to information on the official website of USDE developer Ethena Labs, as reported by BlockBeats on February 21st, Ethena has reached its deposit limit again after announcing the opening of a $50 million USDE deposit pool yesterday. The current TVL of the Ethena protocol has reached $342 million. As previously reported by BlockBeats, on February 16th, Ethena Labs completed a strategic round of funding worth $14 million at a valuation of $300 million, with Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes' family office Maelstrom leading the investment. On February 19th, Ethena Labs launched its public mainnet and introduced the "Shard Campaign" to incentivize users.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Launches $50M USDE Deposit Opportunity with Shard Campaign
extracted_news.body:
ETHENA LABS UNVEILS $50M DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY FOR USDE
ETHENA LABS INTRODUCES A GROUNDBREAKING $50 MILLION USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY, ACCOMPANIED BY THE INNOVATIVE SHARD CAMPAIGN, AIMING TO INCENTIVIZE LONG-TERM ENGAGEMENT AND FOSTER COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT.
ETHENA LABS HAS UNVEILED A GROUNDBREAKING OPPORTUNITY FOR USERS: THE INTRODUCTION OF A $50 MILLION DEPOSIT OPTION FOR USDE. THIS MOVE SIGNALS A SIGNIFICANT DEVELOPMENT WITHIN THE ETHENA ECOSYSTEM, OFFERING USERS A NEW AVENUE TO PARTICIPATE AND POTENTIALLY EARN REWARDS.    IN A RECENT MILESTONE ACHIEVEMENT, ETHENA LABS SUCCESSFULLY LAUNCHED THE USDE STABLECOIN ON THE PUBLIC MAINNET. THIS LAUNCH NOT ONLY DEMONSTRATES ETHENA'S COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION BUT ALSO OPENS UP NEW POSSIBILITIES FOR USERS WITHIN THE ECOSYSTEM. ALONGSIDE THE USDE LAUNCH, ETHENA INTRODUCED THE SHARD CAMPAIGN, A STRATEGIC INITIATIVE AIMED AT ENCOURAGING USER PARTICIPATION AND FOSTERING COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT.  DETAILS OF THE USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY  ETHENA LABS HAS ROLLED OUT A NEW USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY, PRESENTING USERS WITH A CHANCE TO ENGAGE WITH A MAXIMUM CEILING OF $50 MILLION. THIS DEPOSIT OPTION OFFERS USERS A STRAIGHTFORWARD AND ACCESSIBLE MEANS TO GET INVOLVED IN THE ETHENA ECOSYSTEM AND POTENTIALLY EARN REWARDS.    THE PROCESS ENTAILS A 7-DAY COOLDOWN PERIOD FOR DEPOSITS, ALLOWING USERS TO CAREFULLY CONSIDER THEIR PARTICIPATION. DURING THIS PERIOD, USERS CAN DEPOSIT USDE AND EARN 10 SHARDS PER DAY AS PART OF THE OPPORTUNITY. THIS COOLDOWN PERIOD SERVES AS A STRATEGIC MEASURE TO ENSURE A FAIR AND SUSTAINABLE APPROACH TO PARTICIPATION WITHIN THE ECOSYSTEM.    PREVIOUS READ: BREAKING: ETHENA ANNOUNCES PUBLIC MAINNET FOR USDE STABLECOIN WITH SHARD CAMPAIGN  SIGNIFICANCE OF THE SHARD CAMPAIGN  THE SHARD CAMPAIGN REPRESENTS A NOVEL APPROACH BY ETHENA LABS TO CULTIVATE SUSTAINED ENGAGEMENT AND INVOLVEMENT AMONG USERS WITHIN ITS ECOSYSTEM. UNLIKE CONVENTIONAL INCENTIVIZATION METHODS, THE SHARD CAMPAIGN EMPHASIZES LONG-TERM PARTICIPATION AND CONTRIBUTION, FOSTERING A VIBRANT AND COMMITTED COMMUNITY AROUND ETHENA.    BY INTRODUCING THIS INNOVATIVE CAMPAIGN, ETHENA DEMONSTRATES ITS DEDICATION TO PUSHING THE BOUNDARIES OF TRADITIONAL MODELS AND EMBRACING A USER-CENTRIC APPROACH TO DEVELOPMENT. THE SHARD CAMPAIGN SERVES AS A TESTAMENT TO ETHENA'S COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION AND ITS RECOGNITION OF THE VITAL ROLE THAT COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT PLAYS IN DRIVING SUCCESS.    THE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY OFFERS USERS A STRAIGHTFORWARD MEANS TO ENGAGE WITH THE ECOSYSTEM, WITH THE POTENTIAL TO EARN REWARDS BASED ON THEIR CONTRIBUTIONS. ADDITIONALLY, ACTIVE PARTICIPANTS IN THE SHARD CAMPAIGN STAND TO BENEFIT FROM A RANGE OF REWARDS AND INCENTIVES, FURTHER INCENTIVIZING ONGOING ENGAGEMENT AND INVOLVEMENT WITHIN THE ETHENA COMMUNITY.

extracted_news.title: ETHENA Protocol's TVL Hits $285 Million; USDE Curve Pool Reaches Deposit Limit
extracted_news.body: ETHENA TVL has reached $285 million, and the deposit limit for the USDE Curve pool is temporarily reached. According to information from the official website of ETHENA Labs, the developer of USDE, as of February 20th, the total value locked (TVL) of the ETHENA protocol has reached $285 million, with 4,455 participating users. Additionally, the USDE Curve pool participating in the "Shard Campaign" activity has temporarily reached its deposit limit. According to a previous official announcement, the project will continue to increase the limit value in the future. USDE is an Ethereum-based stablecoin that is backed by derivatives and achieves price stability through "Delta Neutral" hedging in centralized and decentralized venues. To create USDE, ETHENA allows users to use USD, ETH or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Launches Public Mainnet and Introduces "Shard Campaign" for USDE
extracted_news.body: Ethena Labs has launched its public mainnet and introduced the "Shard Campaign" to incentivize users. The release of the public mainnet marks the official launch of its Ethereum-based stablecoin, USDE. The "Shard Campaign" is divided into multiple epochs, each focusing on different activities related to USDE and collaboration with various communities. The first epoch will concentrate on the liquidity of the USDE Curve pool. Previously, Ethena Labs completed a strategic funding round worth $14 million, led by notable investors including Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and Maelstrom, with participation from PayPal Ventures, Franklin Templeton, and others. USDE aims to achieve price stability through "delta-neutral" hedging and allows users to use USD, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Launches USDE Stablecoin with Innovative Shard Campaign
extracted_news.body: Ethena has announced the launch of its USDE stablecoin on the public mainnet alongside a unique shard campaign. This campaign aims to incentivize user participation within the ecosystem by offering rewards based on contributions. The introduction of USDE on the public mainnet signifies a significant milestone for Ethena and its community. The shard campaign serves as an innovative method to encourage engagement and foster long-term involvement among users. By rewarding activities within the ecosystem, Ethena aims to create a vibrant and active community dedicated to its success. This approach marks a departure from traditional methods of incentivization, signaling Ethena's commitment to innovation and user-centric development. The shard campaign is structured around multiple short-duration seasons, known as "epochs." Each epoch focuses on different activities related to the USDE stablecoin and community integration. The campaign's duration is not intended to be drawn out, with a commitment to finalize it within three months or when the USDE supply reaches $1 billion, whichever occurs first. Throughout each epoch, participants are incentivized to engage in various activities that contribute to Ethena's ecosystem. These activities include providing liquidity for USDE curve pools, minting with different stablecoins, utilizing USDE on money markets, and more. Each activity is designed to enhance liquidity, foster community involvement, and drive ecosystem development. Early participants in the shard campaign stand to receive higher rewards, as the number of shards awarded per epoch decreases over time. This decay mechanism encourages users to engage early to maximize their rewards. By getting involved from the outset, participants can secure a larger share of rewards and actively contribute to the growth and success of Ethena's ecosystem. Participation in certain jurisdictions, including the United States, is restricted. Users in restricted jurisdictions will find sections of the Ethena web application blocked, including the DApp UI. USDE serves as Ethena's synthetic dollar, backed by staked ETH and short ETH hedges on exchanges. It's the focal point for liquidity provision in AMMs and CEX orderbooks. On the other hand, sUSDE represents staked USDE, accruing value from underlying staked ETH and funding rate earned from short ETH positions. sUSDE is a reward-bearing token, reflecting value accrual within the staking smart contract. The inaugural epoch focuses on Curve LP participation, where users provide liquidity to various USDE pools on Curve. Participants can lock their Curve LP tokens via Ethena's frontend to earn 20 shards per day for each dollar worth of LP tokens locked. Additionally, users can deposit USDE outside of Curve to earn 10 additional shards per USDE.

extracted_news.title: Ethena Labs Secures $14 Million in Strategic Financing for USDE Stablecoin
extracted_news.body: Ethena Labs, the developer of the Ethereum-based stablecoin USDE, has completed a strategic financing round, raising $14 million at a valuation of $300 million. The round was led by Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and Maelstrom, the family office of BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes. Other participants included PayPal Ventures, Franklin Templeton, Avon Ventures, Binance Labs, Deribit, Gemini, and Kraken. The funding round utilized the structure of future equity simple agreement and token convertible notes.

extracted_news.title: BitMEX Reallocates Part of Its USDT Insurance Fund to USDE
extracted_news.body: BitMEX has announced a reallocation of its insurance fund, exchanging some of its Tether (USDT) balance for USDE. This move is detailed in a recent post on the BitMEX blog, marking a strategic adjustment in the management of the fund's assets.

extracted_news.title: Arthur Hayes: USDe will replace USDT as the largest market value stablecoin in the future.
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats reported on December 22 that Arthur Hayes, the founder of BitMEX, stated on social media that USDe, the stablecoin protocol launched by Ethena, will replace USDT as the largest USD stablecoin in the future. However, this will take time and Hayes himself will do his best to fulfill his advisory responsibilities and mint some USDe. It is reported that the issuance of USDe has reached 50 million. The Ethena mainnet will be launched in January 2024.

As previously reported by BlockBeats on July 17, Ethena, a cryptocurrency startup, completed a $6 million seed round of financing led by Dragonfly, with support from trading platforms such as Deribit, Bybit, OKX, Gemini, Huobi, and BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes and his family office. It is reported that the stablecoin USDe developed by Ethena hedges price risk by using user collateral and maintains its anchoring with the USD by shorting Ethereum perpetual swaps.

extracted_news.title: Starknet Reveals Plans to Airdrop STRK Tokens
extracted_news.body: The Starknet Foundation plans to distribute over 1.8 billion STRK tokens to community members and stakeholders through a series of airdrops. The tokens will be allocated for rewarding contributions, user rebates, and incentivizing DeFi activity on the Starknet network. The exact criteria for receiving the tokens and the timeline for the airdrops have not been announced yet.

extracted_news.title: Animoca's Mocaverse Raises More Funding, Up to $31.88M
extracted_news.body: Animoca Brands, a prominent metaverse investor and blockchain game publisher, has raised an additional $11.88 million for its metaverse project Mocaverse. With this funding, the Hong Kong-based firm has now raised a total of $31.88 million to develop a digital identity and loyalty platform for blockchain games and other apps. The project aims to facilitate onboarding and growth for other Web3 platforms through features like digital identity profiles and loyalty points.

extracted_news.title: VanEck's Planned Bitcoin ETF Will Use 'HODL' Ticker
extracted_news.body: VanEck, a major player in the Bitcoin ETF race, has chosen the ticker symbol "HODL" for its potential crypto investment product. The firm filed with the SEC, stating that "HODL" represents the mantra of die-hard Bitcoiners who advocate for holding onto the digital asset. VanEck, along with other high-profile firms, is hoping to release a Bitcoin ETF next year.

extracted_news.title: A Novel Way to Hide Your Bitcoin (It's Literally a Novel)
extracted_news.body: The Novel Wallet is a book designed to hide Bitcoin wallet recovery phrases. Each chapter contains words from the BIP39 list, allowing users to mark the corresponding word in their mnemonic phrase. The book, created as a weekend project, uses Homer's "Iliad" as the text and is open source for others to improve upon.

extracted_news.title: US Senators Propose Bill to Combat Crypto Terrorism Funding
extracted_news.body: US Senators introduce a bill targeting cryptocurrency use in terrorism, aiming to empower the US Treasury in response to security threats.

extracted_news.title: Decentralized reputation protocol Sismo announces cessation of operations.
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats reported on December 9th that Hadrien Charlanes, founder of the decentralized reputation protocol Sismo, announced on social media that "Sismo returned funds to investors today, raising $10.5 million from 130 investors (with a return rate of 51%), which is likely the most successful funding round in history. Investors have been supportive in providing advice without being motivated by short-term interests. Sismo has open-sourced parts that were not previously open, and will maintain basic infrastructure for several months. Thank you to everyone who has helped Sismo along the way."

Sismo is an on-chain reputation project based on zero-knowledge proofs, and its feature is that users can prove ownership of a certain asset without disclosing their wallet address.

extracted_news.body: Senator Elizabeth Warren isn’t leading the charge on this bill linking crypto transactions to terrorism — it comes from Senators Mitt Romney, Mark Warner, Mike Rounds and Jack Reed.

extracted_news.title: Chainlink's staking program has attracted over 600 million US dollars worth of LINK tokens in a short period of time, reaching the limit.
extracted_news.body:
According to BlockBeats news on December 9th, Chainlink Staking v0.2 version attracted over 632 million USD worth of LINK tokens and reached its limit just six hours after the start of its early access period, as reported by CoinDesk.

Chainlink staking allows node operators (who assist engineers in obtaining external data) and community members to support the performance of oracle services by staking LINK tokens. People can also receive rewards.

Chainlink co-founder Sergey Nazarov stated, "Staking v0.2 introduces important new security features and prepares the system for further growth in the coming year."

extracted_news.title: Did Uranium Finance Hacker Blow Funds on 'Magic' Cards?
extracted_news.body: A hacker who exploited the Uranium Finance DeFi platform in 2021 may have used "Magic: The Gathering" trading cards to launder their stolen funds, according to research from noted pseudonymous on-chain sleuth, ZachXBT. The hacker withdrew 11,200 ETH from Tornado Cash in increments of 100 ETH, then swapped it for wrapped ETH (WETH), USDC, and used some of it to buy MTG cards. The funds were also deposited to centralized exchanges Kraken, Bitpay, and Coinbase.

extracted_news.title: RAY short-term breakthrough of $0.7, with a 24-hour increase of 59.76%.
extracted_news.body: According to market data on December 9th, the Solana ecosystem DEX protocol Raydium's token RAY briefly broke through $0.7, and is currently priced at $0.6865, with a 24-hour increase of 59.76%. This news was reported by BlockBeats.

extracted_news.title: Chainlink Price Pops After Staking Program Sees Overwhelming Demand
extracted_news.body: Chainlink's expanded crypto staking program attracted over $632 million worth of LINK tokens within six hours of its early access period. The community staking mechanism reached its new capacity of 40.875 million LINK, with 32.8 million LINK staked within the first 30 minutes. The price of LINK increased by 12% to $16.72.

extracted_news.title: Here’s how the Jito airdrop benefited Solana
extracted_news.body: The Jito airdrop sparked a substantial surge in activity within the Solana ecosystem, accompanied by a remarkable upswing in the price of SOL.

extracted_news.title: VanEck predicts that economic recession will not prevent Bitcoin from reaching new highs in 2024.
extracted_news.body:
BlockBeats News, December 9th - According to The Block, asset management group VanEck stated in its annual cryptocurrency forecast report that despite the expected long-term economic recession in the United States next year, the expected approval of a spot ETF and the upcoming Bitcoin halving event will push Bitcoin to reach a new historical high in the fourth quarter of 2024.

VanEck analysts Matthew Sigel and Patrick Bush predict that due to slowing economic momentum and cooling inflation, the US economy will enter a recession in the first half of 2024, making it more vulnerable to impacts.

VanEck believes that the trading spread for spot Bitcoin ETFs will be around 0.1%, with many brokers offering zero commissions, which will catalyze demand.

extracted_news.title: Lookonchain: A certain fund/institution has transferred 1.76 billion USDT to CEX since October 20th.
extracted_news.body: According to Lookonchain monitoring on December 9th, BlockBeats reported that a mysterious fund/institution received 60 million USDT from Tether Treasury two hours ago. Since October 20th, the fund/institution has received a total of 1.76 billion USDT from Tether Treasury and transferred it to trading platforms. This 1.76 billion USDT can purchase 44,000 BTC at an average price of $40,000.

extracted_news.title: Binance Labs clarifies: The withdrawal of the Abu Dhabi license application is unrelated to Binance, and the decision has been made to return the funds to LP.
extracted_news.body: BlockBeats reported on December 9th that Binance Labs stated that the withdrawal of the Abu Dhabi license application is not related to Binance. The purpose of obtaining the license was to manage funds raised from limited partners (LP). However, Binance Labs decided to focus on incubating early-stage founders and startups, resulting in lower utilization of the fund. Therefore, Binance Labs decided to return the funds to LPs and cancel the license application as they no longer require it.

The mysterious fund/institution received 60M $USDT from #TetherTreasury again 2 hours ago.

This fund/institution has received a total of 1.76B $USDT from #TetherTreasury and transferred to exchanges since Oct 20.

The 1.76B $USDT can buy 44K $BTC at an average price of $40,000.

3.title: Ethena Labs Integrates USDE with Injective Blockchain

To create USDE, Ethna allows users to use US dollars, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

6.title: USDE Market Capitalization Exceeds 400 Million US Dollars
6.body: The market capitalization of USDE, a stablecoin issued by Ethna Labs, has surpassed 400 million US dollars, now standing at 437.65 million US dollars. USDE is based on Ethereum, collateralized by derivatives, and maintains price stability through 'delta neutral' hedging in both centralized and decentralized venues. Ethna Labs allows the creation of USDE using USD, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

7.title: USDE Pool on Ethena Reaches Deposit Limit Again, TVL Hits $406 Million
7.body: The USDE pool on Ethena has once again reached its deposit limit. According to a report by BlockBeats on February 22, Ethena Labs, the developer of USDE, has increased the pool limit of USDE to $100 million. As of now, the deposit limit has been reached again. The current TVL of the USDE pool has reached $406 million.

8.title: Ethena Labs Increases USDE Pool Limit to $100 Million
8.body: Ethena Labs, the developer of USDE, has increased the USDE pool limit to 100 million US dollars as of February 22nd. The current Total Value Locked (TVL) of the pool is 66.25 million US dollars. Additionally, the overall TVL of Ethena is reported to be 364 million US dollars, according to the official website.

9.title: Ethena's $50 Million USDE Deposit Pool Reaches Limit Again; TVL Hits $342 Million
9.body: Since Ethena announced the opening of a USD stablecoin deposit pool with a limit of $50 million yesterday, it has once again reached the deposit limit. According to information on the official website of USDE developer Ethena Labs, as reported by BlockBeats on February 21st, Ethena has reached its deposit limit again after announcing the opening of a $50 million USDE deposit pool yesterday. The current TVL of the Ethena protocol has reached $342 million. As previously reported by BlockBeats, on February 16th, Ethena Labs completed a strategic round of funding worth $14 million at a valuation of $300 million, with Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes' family office Maelstrom leading the investment. On February 19th, Ethena Labs launched its public mainnet and introduced the "Shard Campaign" to incentivize users.

10.title: Ethena Labs Launches $50M USDE Deposit Opportunity with Shard Campaign
10.body:
ETHENA LABS UNVEILS $50M DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY FOR USDE
ETHENA LABS INTRODUCES A GROUNDBREAKING $50 MILLION USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY, ACCOMPANIED BY THE INNOVATIVE SHARD CAMPAIGN, AIMING TO INCENTIVIZE LONG-TERM ENGAGEMENT AND FOSTER COMMUNITY INVOLVEMENT.
ETHENA LABS HAS UNVEILED A GROUNDBREAKING OPPORTUNITY FOR USERS: THE INTRODUCTION OF A $50 MILLION DEPOSIT OPTION FOR USDE. THIS MOVE SIGNALS A SIGNIFICANT DEVELOPMENT WITHIN THE ETHENA ECOSYSTEM, OFFERING USERS A NEW AVENUE TO PARTICIPATE AND POTENTIALLY EARN REWARDS.    IN A RECENT MILESTONE ACHIEVEMENT, ETHENA LABS SUCCESSFULLY LAUNCHED THE USDE STABLECOIN ON THE PUBLIC MAINNET. THIS LAUNCH NOT ONLY DEMONSTRATES ETHENA'S COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION BUT ALSO OPENS UP NEW POSSIBILITIES FOR USERS WITHIN THE ECOSYSTEM. ALONGSIDE THE USDE LAUNCH, ETHENA INTRODUCED THE SHARD CAMPAIGN, A STRATEGIC INITIATIVE AIMED AT ENCOURAGING USER PARTICIPATION AND FOSTERING COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT.  DETAILS OF THE USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY  ETHENA LABS HAS ROLLED OUT A NEW USDE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY, PRESENTING USERS WITH A CHANCE TO ENGAGE WITH A MAXIMUM CEILING OF $50 MILLION. THIS DEPOSIT OPTION OFFERS USERS A STRAIGHTFORWARD AND ACCESSIBLE MEANS TO GET INVOLVED IN THE ETHENA ECOSYSTEM AND POTENTIALLY EARN REWARDS.    THE PROCESS ENTAILS A 7-DAY COOLDOWN PERIOD FOR DEPOSITS, ALLOWING USERS TO CAREFULLY CONSIDER THEIR PARTICIPATION. DURING THIS PERIOD, USERS CAN DEPOSIT USDE AND EARN 10 SHARDS PER DAY AS PART OF THE OPPORTUNITY. THIS COOLDOWN PERIOD SERVES AS A STRATEGIC MEASURE TO ENSURE A FAIR AND SUSTAINABLE APPROACH TO PARTICIPATION WITHIN THE ECOSYSTEM.    PREVIOUS READ: BREAKING: ETHENA ANNOUNCES PUBLIC MAINNET FOR USDE STABLECOIN WITH SHARD CAMPAIGN  SIGNIFICANCE OF THE SHARD CAMPAIGN  THE SHARD CAMPAIGN REPRESENTS A NOVEL APPROACH BY ETHENA LABS TO CULTIVATE SUSTAINED ENGAGEMENT AND INVOLVEMENT AMONG USERS WITHIN ITS ECOSYSTEM. UNLIKE CONVENTIONAL INCENTIVIZATION METHODS, THE SHARD CAMPAIGN EMPHASIZES LONG-TERM PARTICIPATION AND CONTRIBUTION, FOSTERING A VIBRANT AND COMMITTED COMMUNITY AROUND ETHENA.    BY INTRODUCING THIS INNOVATIVE CAMPAIGN, ETHENA DEMONSTRATES ITS DEDICATION TO PUSHING THE BOUNDARIES OF TRADITIONAL MODELS AND EMBRACING A USER-CENTRIC APPROACH TO DEVELOPMENT. THE SHARD CAMPAIGN SERVES AS A TESTAMENT TO ETHENA'S COMMITMENT TO INNOVATION AND ITS RECOGNITION OF THE VITAL ROLE THAT COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT PLAYS IN DRIVING SUCCESS.    THE DEPOSIT OPPORTUNITY OFFERS USERS A STRAIGHTFORWARD MEANS TO ENGAGE WITH THE ECOSYSTEM, WITH THE POTENTIAL TO EARN REWARDS BASED ON THEIR CONTRIBUTIONS. ADDITIONALLY, ACTIVE PARTICIPANTS IN THE SHARD CAMPAIGN STAND TO BENEFIT FROM A RANGE OF REWARDS AND INCENTIVES, FURTHER INCENTIVIZING ONGOING ENGAGEMENT AND INVOLVEMENT WITHIN THE ETHENA COMMUNITY.

11.title: ETHENA Protocol's TVL Hits $285 Million; USDE Curve Pool Reaches Deposit Limit
11.body: ETHENA TVL has reached $285 million, and the deposit limit for the USDE Curve pool is temporarily reached. According to information from the official website of ETHENA Labs, the developer of USDE, as of February 20th, the total value locked (TVL) of the ETHENA protocol has reached $285 million, with 4,455 participating users. Additionally, the USDE Curve pool participating in the "Shard Campaign" activity has temporarily reached its deposit limit. According to a previous official announcement, the project will continue to increase the limit value in the future. USDE is an Ethereum-based stablecoin that is backed by derivatives and achieves price stability through "Delta Neutral" hedging in centralized and decentralized venues. To create USDE, ETHENA allows users to use USD, ETH or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

12.title: Ethena Labs Launches Public Mainnet and Introduces "Shard Campaign" for USDE
12.body: Ethena Labs has launched its public mainnet and introduced the "Shard Campaign" to incentivize users. The release of the public mainnet marks the official launch of its Ethereum-based stablecoin, USDE. The "Shard Campaign" is divided into multiple epochs, each focusing on different activities related to USDE and collaboration with various communities. The first epoch will concentrate on the liquidity of the USDE Curve pool. Previously, Ethena Labs completed a strategic funding round worth $14 million, led by notable investors including Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and Maelstrom, with participation from PayPal Ventures, Franklin Templeton, and others. USDE aims to achieve price stability through "delta-neutral" hedging and allows users to use USD, ETH, or liquidity collateral tokens as collateral.

13.title: Ethena Launches USDE Stablecoin with Innovative Shard Campaign
13.body: Ethena has announced the launch of its USDE stablecoin on the public mainnet alongside a unique shard campaign. This campaign aims to incentivize user participation within the ecosystem by offering rewards based on contributions. The introduction of USDE on the public mainnet signifies a significant milestone for Ethena and its community. The shard campaign serves as an innovative method to encourage engagement and foster long-term involvement among users. By rewarding activities within the ecosystem, Ethena aims to create a vibrant and active community dedicated to its success. This approach marks a departure from traditional methods of incentivization, signaling Ethena's commitment to innovation and user-centric development. The shard campaign is structured around multiple short-duration seasons, known as "epochs." Each epoch focuses on different activities related to the USDE stablecoin and community integration. The campaign's duration is not intended to be drawn out, with a commitment to finalize it within three months or when the USDE supply reaches $1 billion, whichever occurs first. Throughout each epoch, participants are incentivized to engage in various activities that contribute to Ethena's ecosystem. These activities include providing liquidity for USDE curve pools, minting with different stablecoins, utilizing USDE on money markets, and more. Each activity is designed to enhance liquidity, foster community involvement, and drive ecosystem development. Early participants in the shard campaign stand to receive higher rewards, as the number of shards awarded per epoch decreases over time. This decay mechanism encourages users to engage early to maximize their rewards. By getting involved from the outset, participants can secure a larger share of rewards and actively contribute to the growth and success of Ethena's ecosystem. Participation in certain jurisdictions, including the United States, is restricted. Users in restricted jurisdictions will find sections of the Ethena web application blocked, including the DApp UI. USDE serves as Ethena's synthetic dollar, backed by staked ETH and short ETH hedges on exchanges. It's the focal point for liquidity provision in AMMs and CEX orderbooks. On the other hand, sUSDE represents staked USDE, accruing value from underlying staked ETH and funding rate earned from short ETH positions. sUSDE is a reward-bearing token, reflecting value accrual within the staking smart contract. The inaugural epoch focuses on Curve LP participation, where users provide liquidity to various USDE pools on Curve. Participants can lock their Curve LP tokens via Ethena's frontend to earn 20 shards per day for each dollar worth of LP tokens locked. Additionally, users can deposit USDE outside of Curve to earn 10 additional shards per USDE.

14.title: Ethena Labs Secures $14 Million in Strategic Financing for USDE Stablecoin
14.body: Ethena Labs, the developer of the Ethereum-based stablecoin USDE, has completed a strategic financing round, raising $14 million at a valuation of $300 million. The round was led by Dragonfly, Brevan Howard Digital, and Maelstrom, the family office of BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes. Other participants included PayPal Ventures, Franklin Templeton, Avon Ventures, Binance Labs, Deribit, Gemini, and Kraken. The funding round utilized the structure of future equity simple agreement and token convertible notes.

15.title: BitMEX Reallocates Part of Its USDT Insurance Fund to USDE
15.body: BitMEX has announced a reallocation of its insurance fund, exchanging some of its Tether (USDT) balance for USDE. This move is detailed in a recent post on the BitMEX blog, marking a strategic adjustment in the management of the fund's assets.

16.title: Arthur Hayes: USDe will replace USDT as the largest market value stablecoin in the future.
16.body:
BlockBeats reported on December 22 that Arthur Hayes, the founder of BitMEX, stated on social media that USDe, the stablecoin protocol launched by Ethena, will replace USDT as the largest USD stablecoin in the future. However, this will take time and Hayes himself will do his best to fulfill his advisory responsibilities and mint some USDe. It is reported that the issuance of USDe has reached 50 million. The Ethena mainnet will be launched in January 2024.

As previously reported by BlockBeats on July 17, Ethena, a cryptocurrency startup, completed a $6 million seed round of financing led by Dragonfly, with support from trading platforms such as Deribit, Bybit, OKX, Gemini, Huobi, and BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes and his family office. It is reported that the stablecoin USDe developed by Ethena hedges price risk by using user collateral and maintains its anchoring with the USD by shorting Ethereum perpetual swaps.

30.title: Animoca's Mocaverse Raises More Funding, Up to $31.88M
30.body: Animoca Brands, a prominent metaverse investor and blockchain game publisher, has raised an additional $11.88 million for its metaverse project Mocaverse. With this funding, the Hong Kong-based firm has now raised a total of $31.88 million to develop a digital identity and loyalty platform for blockchain games and other apps. The project aims to facilitate onboarding and growth for other Web3 platforms through features like digital identity profiles and loyalty points.

31.title: VanEck's Planned Bitcoin ETF Will Use 'HODL' Ticker
31.body: VanEck, a major player in the Bitcoin ETF race, has chosen the ticker symbol "HODL" for its potential crypto investment product. The firm filed with the SEC, stating that "HODL" represents the mantra of die-hard Bitcoiners who advocate for holding onto the digital asset. VanEck, along with other high-profile firms, is hoping to release a Bitcoin ETF next year.

32.title: A Novel Way to Hide Your Bitcoin (It's Literally a Novel)
32.body: The Novel Wallet is a book designed to hide Bitcoin wallet recovery phrases. Each chapter contains words from the BIP39 list, allowing users to mark the corresponding word in their mnemonic phrase. The book, created as a weekend project, uses Homer's "Iliad" as the text and is open source for others to improve upon.

33.title: US Senators Propose Bill to Combat Crypto Terrorism Funding
33.body: US Senators introduce a bill targeting cryptocurrency use in terrorism, aiming to empower the US Treasury in response to security threats.

34.title: Decentralized reputation protocol Sismo announces cessation of operations.
34.body:
BlockBeats reported on December 9th that Hadrien Charlanes, founder of the decentralized reputation protocol Sismo, announced on social media that "Sismo returned funds to investors today, raising $10.5 million from 130 investors (with a return rate of 51%), which is likely the most successful funding round in history. Investors have been supportive in providing advice without being motivated by short-term interests. Sismo has open-sourced parts that were not previously open, and will maintain basic infrastructure for several months. Thank you to everyone who has helped Sismo along the way."

Sismo is an on-chain reputation project based on zero-knowledge proofs, and its feature is that users can prove ownership of a certain asset without disclosing their wallet address.

35.title: US senators target crypto in bill enforcing sanctions on terrorist groups
35.body: Senator Elizabeth Warren isn’t leading the charge on this bill linking crypto transactions to terrorism — it comes from Senators Mitt Romney, Mark Warner, Mike Rounds and Jack Reed.

Chainlink staking allows node operators (who assist engineers in obtaining external data) and community members to support the performance of oracle services by staking LINK tokens. People can also receive rewards.

Chainlink co-founder Sergey Nazarov stated, "Staking v0.2 introduces important new security features and prepares the system for further growth in the coming year."

43.title: Did Uranium Finance Hacker Blow Funds on 'Magic' Cards?
43.body: A hacker who exploited the Uranium Finance DeFi platform in 2021 may have used "Magic: The Gathering" trading cards to launder their stolen funds, according to research from noted pseudonymous on-chain sleuth, ZachXBT. The hacker withdrew 11,200 ETH from Tornado Cash in increments of 100 ETH, then swapped it for wrapped ETH (WETH), USDC, and used some of it to buy MTG cards. The funds were also deposited to centralized exchanges Kraken, Bitpay, and Coinbase.

48.title: VanEck predicts that economic recession will not prevent Bitcoin from reaching new highs in 2024.
48.body:
BlockBeats News, December 9th - According to The Block, asset management group VanEck stated in its annual cryptocurrency forecast report that despite the expected long-term economic recession in the United States next year, the expected approval of a spot ETF and the upcoming Bitcoin halving event will push Bitcoin to reach a new historical high in the fourth quarter of 2024.

VanEck analysts Matthew Sigel and Patrick Bush predict that due to slowing economic momentum and cooling inflation, the US economy will enter a recession in the first half of 2024, making it more vulnerable to impacts.

VanEck believes that the trading spread for spot Bitcoin ETFs will be around 0.1%, with many brokers offering zero commissions, which will catalyze demand.

Since October 20th, the fund/institution has received a total of 1.76 billion USDT from Tether Treasury and transferred it to trading platforms. This 1.76 billion USDT can purchase 44,000 BTC at an average price of $40,000.

51.title: Binance Labs clarifies: The withdrawal of the Abu Dhabi license application is unrelated to Binance, and the decision has been made to return the funds to LP.
51.body: BlockBeats reported on December 9th that Binance Labs stated that the withdrawal of the Abu Dhabi license application is not related to Binance. The purpose of obtaining the license was to manage funds raised from limited partners (LP). However, Binance Labs decided to focus on incubating early-stage founders and startups, resulting in lower utilization of the fund. Therefore, Binance Labs decided to return the funds to LPs and cancel the license application as they no longer require it.
